alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 3:35AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, except 15 to 30 inches on ridge tops and elevations above 6500 feet MSL. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, Island Park, and Kilgore. * WHEN...From this afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley
